price: នៅក្នុងនោះ ពួកគេមានអី្វៗដែលពួកគេប្រាថ្នាចង់បាន ហើយយើងនឹងបន្ថែមជាច្រើនទៀត ។
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
